sentences.en: A similar in the middle of last month % disapproving and 44 % approving.
sentences.cn: 上月中旬一次类似的%的人不赞同44%的人赞同.

sentences.en: A similar one in the middle of last month had 50 % disapproving and % approving.
sentences.cn: 上月中旬一次类似的50%的人不赞同%的人赞同.

sentences.en: A similar one in the middle of last month had 50 % disapproving and 44 % approving.
sentences.cn: 上月中旬一次类似的调查显示,50%的人不赞同,44%的人赞同.

sentences.en: He is correct in disapproving of her idea.
sentences.cn: 他反对他的想法是对的.
他摇晃着手指表示不同意。

sentences.en: He'd probably give me disapproving look that I'd seen in Mom's eyes from time to time.
sentences.cn: 他可能会失望地看着我,就像妈妈时不时看我的眼神.

sentences.en: Her mother had adopted a disapproving attitude.
sentences.cn: 她母亲采取了不赞成的态度.

sentences.en: His disapproving attitude toward cars is simply sour grapes; the fact is that he would like to have a car but can't afford to buy one.
sentences.cn: 他对汽车持不赞成的态度纯粹是酸葡萄逻辑; 事实上他也想有一部汽车,只是买不起罢了.

sentences.en: His disapproving remarks about cars are nothing but sour grapes.
sentences.cn: 他那些不以为然的话不过是酸葡萄心理罢了.

sentences.en: If I made through the door I encountered the disapproving gaze of Jane Rothe.
sentences.cn: 如果我走出门去,会遇到简·罗丝投来的不赞许的目光.

sentences.en: If I made through the door I would encounter the disapproving gaze of Jane Rothe.
sentences.cn: 如果我走出门去,会遇到简?罗丝投来的不赞许的目光.

sentences.en: Janet gave him a disapproving look.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特不满地看了他一眼。

sentences.en: Mother gave me a disapproving look.
sentences.cn: 母亲的眼神告诉我她是不赞成的.

sentences.en: On the podium J ? Eric Humphrey stood impassively, waiting for the disapproving chorus to subside.
sentences.cn: 约? 埃里克?汉弗莱不动声色地站在指挥台上, 等着反对的喧嚣声消退.

sentences.en: Teddy clucked his tongue like a disapproving English matron.
sentences.cn: 特迪咂了咂舌头，活像个不以为然的英国女舍监。

words.tran_cn: 不以为然地；非难地；不赞成地

trans.tran_en: A disapproving action or expression shows that you do not approve of something or someone

trans.tran_cn: 不赞成( disapprove的现在分词 )
